CONSIDERATION\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The information provided in this presentation is a summary only, and intended to reinforce EPAM and Client official policies. It should not be considered complete, nor should it be used in the place of the official policies. We strongly suggests that you visit you review those policies on a regular basis and consult with your manager if you have questions.   \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Keep in mind that while not all breaches of training or policy compliance result in a penalty, management will review all factors in determining if any penalty or disciplinary action will be taken.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
